fitnessApp

Class weight

  • java.lang.Object
    • fitnessApp.dbConnection
      • fitnessApp.weight

  • public class weight
extends dbConnection
    This class extends the dbConnection class to connect to the Weight Table in the database

    12/5/18
    Author:
    Carson Uecker-Herman

      • get

        public static void get()
        Gets values from the Weight table for today's date. The data received is set equal to the local variables that correspond to the column name
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - could not execute SQL statement

      • getWeek

        public static void getWeek()
        Gets values from the Weight table for the current week. The data received is added to the Map data structure holds the information for each day
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - could not execute SQL statement
